short_summary: Desalter Kit, Sea Water for CFSD Montreal and CFSD Edmonton
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal - Sollicitation

## Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a Desalter Kit, Sea Water, in support of its activities at Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD). This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued to solicit bids for the supply of the required item.

## Description of Requirement

The DND requires the following items to be delivered to CFSD Montreal and Edmonton:

* 100 Desalter Kit, Sea Water, Part No.: MARK2TYPEII, NCAGE: 3Z202, GSIN: 4610, Unit of Issue: EA (each)

## Conditions of Delivery

The goods must be delivered to the following addresses:

* CFSD Montreal
* CFSD Edmonton
by October 15th, 2022.

## Key Points of Note

* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* This RFP was previously published  on October 11th, 2022 and has been updated one time on October 27th, 2022.

## Eligibility

* This RFP is open to all eligible bidders.
* Participation is restricted to Canadian companies that meet the necessary trade agreements.

## Documents

* The bid solicitation document is available for download at: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

* The evaluation of bids will be conducted based on the following criteria:
	+ Technical requirements
	+ Pricing
	+ Delivery schedule
* The DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement of goods.

## Closing Information

* The bid solicitation is closed on November 14th, 2022 at 2 PM (14:00) EST.
* All bids must be submitted electronically via [epost Connect](http://epost Connect). service.

**Important Details**

* This is a Request for Proposal, which is an open bidding process.
* The RFP process includes multiple trade agreements, including:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
